annonstext:
EDAG Engineering Scandinavia AB is a Gothenburg-based company with a familiar atmosphere and at the same time the potential of a global world-class development company. With our 120 employees we are the largest independent German consultant company in the region. Within the group we are over 8500 employees all over the world and direct supplier to major automotive companies and their suppliers, which is our core business.

We’re expanding our team within Cyber Security and you have the opportunity to become a key player in a young team. We are striving to become a leading authority within this field in our region and for the right person there are big opportunities to evolve and further develop yourself.

Your responsibilities

	Engage in developing, researching and maturing new technologies
	A wide working arena ranging from high-level conceptual development to hands on implementation of cybersecurity solutions including process and methodology.
	Support product development to formulate security business objectives, analyze product cybersecurity risks
	Identify high-level cybersecurity requirements and define risk mitigations in the context of electrical and/or electronic systems

Our requirements

	M.Sc. degree within Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent level of education 
	Broad understanding of cybersecurity concepts, preferably through a few years of experience from industry or academic research in the area of cybersecurity.
	You have good knowledge about ISO 21434 and its related ISO standards (like ISO 24089, ISO 26262 etc.). 
	Ability to work both on a concept level as well as implementing those concepts in prototypes and serial setups
	Genuine interest in exploring and learning new technologies
	Desire to be in the forefront of technology
	Creative and innovative mindset
	Ability to drive things to completion
	Fluent in English (written and spoken) 

We offer

	Exiting assignments within the field of Cyber Security
	An opportunity to learn and grow with the team, and the company
	Fancy other countries and cultures? We offer worldwide application possibilities
	It is not always about work – therefore we have regular team events
